key.name: icon-display
key.description: Set to true to display icon in the panel

key.name: show-sum
key.summary: Show sum of upload and download speed
key.description: If true shows the sum of upload and download speed; otherwise, shows them seperately.

key.name: device
key.description: By default, the sum of usages will be monitored. However, if you want to monitor just a specific device, set this value to that device.

key.name: timer
key.summary: The interval between updates in miliseconds
key.description: The interval between updates in miliseconds

key.name: digits
key.description: The number of digits displayed, minimum 3

key.name: label-size
key.summary: The size of label, this may be removed later and automatically measured for 3 digits the size should be 38

key.name: unit-label-size
key.summary: The size of label, this may be removed later and automatically. For common units 28 works

key.name: menu-label-size
key.summary: The size of labels on the menus, this may be removed later and automatically measured for 3 digits the size should be 65

key.name: use-bytes
key.description: Set to true to show B/s (bytes per second), false to use b/s (bits per second)

key.name: bin-prefixes
key.description: Set to true to show binary prefixes (Mib/s, GiB/s, etc), false for decimal prefixes (Mb/s, GB/s, etc)

key.name: hi-dpi-factor
key.description: For normal displays this will be 1. If you want to be able to have bigger labels increase the value for this.

key.name: show-ips
key.description: Set to true to show IPs for each interface
